title: Project manager (green building certification)
skills: Responsibility, communicativeness, active position, flexibility, purposefulness, curiosity.

primary.name: Moscow State University of Engineering Ecology

experience.description:
•	To provide Green building rating services to the customers. 
•	Design review and evaluation of: energy efficiency, water consumption savings measures, material use efficiency, transport accessibility, energy monitoring systems, BMS for the BREEAM, LEED projects
•	Building’s energy models, passive design measures, free cooling and low/zero carbon technologies analysis. 
•	Asset’s adaptation to climate change analysis.
•	To guide project teams through the rating process 
•	To research and evaluate systems and products to ensure compliance with green building measures.
•	To provide recommendations to project teams to improve building performance 
•	To perform site visits to verify compliance with rating requirements 
•	To coordinate meetings, tasks and reviews with internal partners 
•	To communicate project status to partners and project team members

industries.name: Строительство коммерческих объектов (торговые площади, офисные здания)

experience.description:
•	To provide Green building rating services to customers
•	Design review and evaluation of: energy efficiency, water consumption savings measures, material use efficiency, transport accessibility, energy monitoring systems, BMS for the BREEAM, LEED projects
•	Building’s energy models, passive design measures, free cooling, low and zero carbon technologies analysis. 
•	Asset’s adaptation to climate change analysis.
•	To guide project teams through the rating process 
•	To research and evaluate systems and products to ensure compliance with green building measures.

To provide Green building rating services to customers. Use the locally developed and maintained green building rating systems to evaluate the sustainability of new buildings and major remodels (BREEAM standards).
To guide project teams through the rating process.
To research and evaluate systems and products to ensure compliance with green building measures. Provide recommendations to project teams to improve building performance.
To perform site visits to verify compliance with rating requirements.
To coordinate meetings, tasks and reviews with internal partners.
To communicate project status to partners and project team members.

experience.company: Joint Institute for High Temperatures (JIHT), RAS
experience.description:
A theoretical research and design of residential house heat supply system using a thermochemical heat pump. Description and Analysis of Adsorption Heat Storage Device.
Mathematical modeling of thermochemical storage cycle in MatLab (Simulink) 
New heating and cooling solutions using low grade sources of thermal energy
Analysis of energy supply technologies efficiency.
Analysis of changes in energy consumption that are caused by weather variation.
Economic analysis of energy supply technologies.
HVAC load calculations.
Hot water demand calculations.
Cold water demand calculations.
Selecting type, capacity and heating surface of calorifiers - or heat exchangers.

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
